text:
GoDaddy - Sunnyvale, CA and Phoenix, AZ

We are looking for a talented Ruby on Rails developer to help us build our next generation e-commerce product, a key component in expanding our 13+ million customers' digital presence.

Our Online Store product is built on a solid foundation using open source software, lightweight agile processes and tools to optimize developer happiness.

Come join us!

https://hire.jobvite.com/j?cj=onAg0fwX
